snippet: Federal regulators have ordered Scapadas Magicas L.L.C. to pull its tour buses off the road because they pose an imminent hazard to public safety.
lead_paragraph: Federal regulators have ordered Scapadas Magicas L.L.C. to pull its tour buses off the road because they pose an imminent hazard to public safety.

headline.seo: California Bus Operator Ordered to Shut Down After Fatal Crash
headline.main: Bus Company Told to Cease After a Crash
headline.print_headline: Bus Company Told to Cease After a Crash
